Integrate with an OpenID Connect identit: Integrate with an OpenID Connect identity provider using an Authorization Code Flow.
The URL that the OpenID provider asserts: The URL that the OpenID provider asserts as its issuer identifier. It must use the https scheme with no URL query parameters or fragment.
Claims map metadata from the OpenID prov: Claims map metadata from the OpenID provider to an OpenShift user. The first non-empty claim is used.
Any scopes to request in addition to the: Any scopes to request in addition to the standard openid scope.
Name: Name
The list of claims whose values should b: The list of claims whose values should be used as the display name.
The list of claims whose values should be used as the email address.
